data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Hunedoara.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hunedoara, Romania
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Hunedoara, Romania know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Hunedoara, Romania. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Hunedoara to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the South Asian, general people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Hunedoara, Romania to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Hunedoara.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hunedoara, Romania has a population of 380,000.

We estimate Hunedoara has 24,053 people who might know Jesus, 331,839 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 24,108 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Hunedoara.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
